tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wallet_address VARCHAR,
    balance DECIMAL,
    encryption_key BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sender_wallet_id INT,
	receiver_wallet_id INT,
	amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_wallets (id),
	FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_wallets (id)
);

CREATE TABLE crypto_wallets (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	wallet_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	encrypted_private_key TEXT NOT NULL,
	public_key TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	tx_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL,
	receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL,
	amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
	transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE wallet_users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	password_hash TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT NOT NULL,
	access_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	access_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE user_encryption_keys (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE wallet_data (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    wallet_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    balance DECIMAL(18,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_wallet FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_encryption_keys(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wallet_id INT NOT NULL,
    sender_wallet VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_wallet VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_wallet_logs FOREIGN KEY (wallet_id) REFERENCES wallet_data(wallet_id)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_access_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_encryption_keys(user_id)
)
